question_text: Which of the following statements about laptop RAM are true? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Laptop RAM uses the SODIMM form factor
Laptop RAM is always soldered to the motherboard
Some laptops allow you to upgrade RAM by removing a panel
All laptops have two RAM slots
correct_answer: Laptop RAM uses the SODIMM form factor
Some laptops allow you to upgrade RAM by removing a panel
explanation: SODIMM is the typical laptop memory form factor. Some laptops allow upgrades, while others have RAM soldered to the board.
